description: The attacker gathers information about the target system, identifying potential vulnerabilities or weak points in the security measures.
The attacker creates a malicious SQL query that can exploit the identified vulnerabilities.
The attacker delivers the malicious SQL query to the target system. This could be through a form input on a website, for example
The malicious SQL query is executed on the target system, exploiting the vulnerability.
In some cases, the SQL injection attack may allow the attacker to install malicious software on the target system.
The attacker now has control over the target system and can issue commands to it.
The attacker carries out their intended actions, such as data theft, data manipulation, or further attacks on other systems.
